name: Welcome to the Spiders
description:
Welcome to the Spiders

Created for LOWREZJAM

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left Click to shoot
  • Escape to return to title / quit
  • F1 to make screen smaller
  • F3 to make the screen bigger
  • F2 to reset screen size
SFX:

Universal Sound FX 1.3

Completion stats
- Jam Length - 18 days (Apr 1 - Apr 18 2016)
- Development Length - ~5-6 days
